title: Let's Roll: Scooter Watch Face
summary: Take a fresh breath of freedom, cruising with this awesome scooter watch face!
developerAddress: Ukraine, 02081, Kiev, Darnitskij area, Anna Akhmatova street, 22, office 4009

descriptionHTML:
🛵“Life is a journey - enjoy your ride.” - Unknown

There is nothing like a fresh wind on your face while cruising on a nifty old-school scooter. This watch face can be a perfect reminder of that feeling, in an easy, relaxing and dynamic manner.

Take a break from overloaded days and simply enjoy the travel. Your watch will keep up, smoothly accompanying the flow of your journey with an elegant style and great animations.

🌟Main features:
- Carefully-crafted animated arrows;
- Scooter spins every minute (optional);
- Battery life indicator;
- Smart ambient mode.

⌚Is it for me?
Let’s Roll is designed for Android Wear watches and works perfectly both on circular and rectangular models.

Supports all Android Wear watches, including:
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 1;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 2;
✔ Moto 360 Sport;
✔ Motorola 360 1st gen;
✔ Motorola 360 2nd gen;
✔ LG G Watch;
✔ LG G Watch R;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane 2;
✔ Samsung Gear Live;
✔ Sony Smartwatch 3;
✔ Casio WSD-F10;
✔ Fossil Q Founder;
✔ Huawei Watch;
✔ TAG Heuer Connected.

💣Important Notice!💥
Samsung Gear, Samsung Gear S, Samsung Gear S2 are NOT YET supported. Please, for Samsung smartwatches based on Tizen follow the link: https://goo.gl/M1ABvk

🚀How to install?
This watch face will be installed automatically from your paired phone.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Android Wear App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Once installed, you can select the Let's Roll: Scooter Watch Face from the Android Wear App or directly on your watch. Few taps and you are ready to go!

📝Want to drop us a message?
We'd love hearing from you!
Contact us via our website: http://boostwatch.style
Google+ page: https://goo.gl/CJ79u2
or e-mail: wearables@boost.solutions

Ready to take a ride? Hop on🛵
And don't forget to check out our store for more fine-crafted watch faces - https://goo.gl/S4Dcqa🙊
comments: This is a cool watch face ! I have it since long .But,never got bored ;)
Its superb. I was looking for some flying plane over the world glob watchface and got this. Really very nice...
Great watch face for moto 360 gen 2 ever
I tried everything to sync to my Hauwei watch and nothing. Please help. Update... I fixed itüòâ works fine now.
Great watch face for scooter lovers!
